website_summaries.verdict: The best nursing pillow on the market today – you won't find one with more to offer or a better, more comfortable design.
pros: Constructed of a polyester and cotton combination that provides exceptional comfort and support
It has a removable cover, and the pillow is also easy to wash
cons: It falls at the higher end of the price range, but you get a lot for the money

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable,  Easy.
customer_reviews.text: I originally had a boppy with my daughter, and I wish i would have just gotten another one, but I made the mistake of getting the other top brand nursing pillow instead. Now that I have bought another boppy, this momma and baby couldn't be happier. His latch is better, there are less steps to put it on (no buckle that just comes undone anyway) and it is just more comfortable overall. Boppy is where it is at. Won't be venturing off again. And this print is just so cute! PSA from a mom who has had multiple children with reflux... GET THE WATER RESISTANT PROTECTOR as well. The pillow will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Must have for nursing moms!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for breast feeing moms. My wife loves this pillow, it makes breast feeding our infant so much more comfortable. The shape fits perfectly around her waist and allows her to balance our daughter with ease for long marathon feeding sessions without too much discomfort. Breast feeding takes a ton of effort and time so any little thing that makes the task easier is worth the money in my book. The cover is washable which is great since it will eventually get messed up no matter how careful you may try to be. The animal prints are fun without being too busy so overall, I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: NOVADAD

customer_reviews.title: Boopy was way too soft and didnt hold the form well crunching in the middle as overall pillow is small (my wife is pretty petite
customer_reviews.text: Ok Pillow, my wife got 3 different pillows to test out: Boopy, Fisher Price and My Breast Friend. Boopy was way too soft and didnt hold the form well crunching in the middle as overall pillow is small (my wife is pretty petite so we don't understand why it is so small), My Breast Friend is an interesting idea but not useful for all chairs, positions, quality of fabric and pillow isn't great neither feels cheap as material and foam. Fisher Price was a winner for us it is sturdy, material is sheer and good quality, and it works overall in multiple setting chairs/bed etc.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Add this to your Baby Registry
customer_reviews.text: Every new and pro mom should have this pillow! It's the best and once they outgrow, you can use it yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my Boppys! Great for feeding the baby on your lap with a bottle, breastfeeding, sitting baby up when full support is still needed, sit up support for baby on the floor, etc. I love the covers too; they're tightly woven so liquids don't penetrate right away. I still use a pillow protector & wash my covers periodically but even without the protective layer the pillow is well protected from spills.
customer_reviews.author: TiGar

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to order a boppy from amazon because I couldn’t see or feel it but im glad I did! It arrived in a sealed plastic package with the companies name and logo- it’s the real brand! The colors were bright and vibrant and the pattern was just as pictured! The pillow is the perfect combination between firm and soft and will be super helpful with feeding the baby!
customer_reviews.author: Chacha123

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!!
customer_reviews.text: Life saver. Necessity for all breastfeeding moms. Baby always falls asleep on it. For new parents with no sleep this is a life saver. Of course once he is asleep you have to move him over to there bassinet/crib. Prior to this I always had to search for the pillow with the right fluff or prop two to have stability for the baby and my arms. Having the proper posture when feeding is key to avoid aches and pains of back and arms. Cute design love it. I do have to say that I would benefit from a waist strap so that the pillow is not moving away from me while feeding baby. Other than that it works great.
customer_reviews.author: SHoe OBSessed

customer_reviews.title: Not great for breastfeeding
customer_reviews.text: I found the boppy to be overstuffed and having too much of a “slope” to properly breastfeed with. I’m a small person (about 120lb post partum) and this pillow didn’t fit around my waist easily. I ended up purchasing another popular breastfeeding pillow and would highly recommend the flatter surface. The nice thing about this pillow is that I can use it as a pillow for the baby now. I also used it to sit on after tearing so badly!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa C

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Love that the case easily comes off to be able to throw in the wash. The jungle print is very cute and the uses of this pillow is extremely versatile. Only downside is it's a little small trying to fit it around my midsection to use for nursing support. I'm 2 weeks postpartum and about 140lbs. But I just turn it a little to whichever side I'm currently nursing on and it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Washable!
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to a friend whom I see frequently, and her and baby both love it. She's a young mother, and really needed as much support as possible. This made breastfeeding and bottle feeding far more comfortable for both of them. It is very comfortable and supportive, but most importantly was easy to wash so you could use over and over again. It also helps that it came in an adorable pattern!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Bock

customer_reviews.title: My best friend. Honestly a life saver
customer_reviews.text: My best friend. Honestly a life saver. I cannot stresss enough how important having this pillow with you during your hospital stay after you give birth to establish a successful breastfeeding experience. Believe me! I almost gave up nursing because I couldn't get comfortable enough to deal with the uterus pain and having an epidural done. I have given it one less star because after less than a month use, it isn't as firm as I hoped it would be. nothing too drastic but enough to notice after having to frequently readjust baby. Hopefully future models will have improved this small downfall with firmer material.
customer_reviews.author: Anahi Santos

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't find this useful for nursing at all. It was far too firm and unless you are a slender mother it does not fit around your waist. A cheap firm pillow from the store worked better. One of my children enjoyed sitting in it and my uncle now uses it at night for his neck. I guess if you have neck problems you could try it but it wasn't good for its intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Grace McTwiddles

customer_reviews.title: I have to say I love Boppy pillows
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I love Boppy pillows! I breast fed for 3 years my first child and this pillow lasted till he was about 1-he was about 20 pounds by then a little chunker but could still lay on it nicely. Super comfy pillow for both mom and baby-that is why I am buying another for my soon to be little one coming!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: This pattern is super cute and I love that you can take it ...
customer_reviews.text: I use my boppy pillow daily to nurse and my son is 5 months old. It’s easier on me and gives my arms the much needed break! This pattern is super cute and I love that you can take it off and wash it or even switch covers if you want! Boppy is great!
customer_reviews.author: Kass

customer_reviews.title: Baby Necessity for every parent
customer_reviews.text: Literally one of the best new born necessities a parent can have. I give this to every mother at their baby shower. This pillow can grow with the new born from nursing to tummy time and to prop the baby up. You won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny T. le

customer_reviews.title: Boppy bop drop.
customer_reviews.text: So this pillow didn' work out for my baby and I I have to sit him upright when feedinf because of his acid reflux. I tried using it for tummy time and a lounger but he would fidget and be uncomfortable. These may work out if you are breast feeding. Bottle feeders we need something more flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Layla

customer_reviews.title: Must have for any new mom...and dad!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for brother (soon to be new dad). Yes, it’s a nursing pillow and moms LOOOOOVE IT, but when I was a new dad, I found it perfect for resting the babe on my lap for bottle feeding, or just when my arms needed a rest.
customer_reviews.author: force

customer_reviews.title: Purchased two!
customer_reviews.text: First off, I am a new father to a young man. I live in a two story home and walking the stairs every time I need to move an item is a hassle. I do it, just as i'm sure most of you do. Now on to the Item. The Boppy Nursing Pillow. This pillow is great! I love it, I purchased two! I use it for everything from holding my elbow up, to letting my little guy take a 5 minute tummy time session. This pillow has numerous uses.
customer_reviews.author: anthony

customer_reviews.title: So Cuteeeee
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my first. Brought it to the hospital which was so helpful for breastfeeding. Used it a lot in the first months and more as he grew. Hes 4 months now and we still use it a ton!!! Get extra covers, maybe a waterproof one. One poop through and its stained. Otherwise perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Best nursing pillow ever !
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my wife - In her words :"The best nursing pillow ever! It was my best friend till my baby was 6 mo.You can use it for all the good purposes mentioned on the packaging.And I felt it was much stronger (hold) than the other nursing pillows.I would say worth the price!"
customer_reviews.author: Tanmoy Baidya

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: This is my second boppy. I dont know but this one really stiff and isn't as comfortable as my other one. The cover isn't really soft either. It will do the job but I perfer the other boppy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend the Boppy
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend the Boppy. This was my daughter's most used gift. The adults all used it holding and feeding the baby. And it is used by baby during different stages of development. This is what I always buy for baby gifts. I bought for my daughter-in-law and she took it to the hospital.
customer_reviews.author: kattay11

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: I let my husband get rid of my first boppy after I was only able to nurse for 2 weeks - first timers! I purchased a new one shortly thereafter! We use this thing all the time. These are great for tummy time in smaller babies, and it was great to prop up my son when he could hold his own bottle but still needed support to eat. He's 10 months old and he still reclines in it from time to time. Bonus - we've learned its a great pillow for us on road trips!
customer_reviews.author: W. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful after C-section
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter in law. She had to have a C-section and took this to the hospital with her and used right away!
customer_reviews.author: Mary McEntee

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Good quality take away a star because it's not white as in picture it's a off white color kind of looking dirty or not new.
customer_reviews.author: ben

customer_reviews.title: Oops!
customer_reviews.text: The packaging and product is in GREAT condition and looks very high-quality, I was excited to gift this! :) However, the barcode on the product said "peaceful jungle" but was delivered with the "mod owls" PINK slipcover! This gift is for a boy! Make sure the slipcover actually matches what is on the barcode
customer_reviews.author: lacy wade

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth it if you are a FTM
customer_reviews.text: I really like my boppy! It really made a difference for us. However, it could improve a little on the support. I usually have to put another pillow on the side if I want to do the football hold, otherwise it works and I’m glad I got it!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Fajardo

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought my breast friend but I'm recovering from a c-section and this pillow is so much easier to use in bed. My newborn loves it and it's made nursing much easier. Really recommend to any mom's still on the fence.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Buy this
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is absolutely perfect, and the print is adorable. I only paid $28 for it brand new and some change rather than the traditional $39.99 asking price of boppy pillows everywhere else. I would definitely recommend buying this pillow from Amazon to save you money and not have to sacrifice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer

customer_reviews.title: Love the Boppy Pillow
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that the cover reeks of plastic smell. Otherwise, wash it in draft and we’re good to go. Love this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Mccoy

customer_reviews.title: None Compare so just buy this one.
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey for a pillow, but honestly none compare, even when bottle feeding. I can see the value of having one. It's bulky for travel but that is about the only con I can think of. When I asked "twin" what she wanted I gladly bought it, knowing it wasn't going to be a gift that just sat around. I rather know what someone wants or needs than guess. These get well used so it is worth the money and just under that price I call a cutoff point for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Tree Poster

customer_reviews.title: My great companion
customer_reviews.text: Great pillow! I was using it for nursing for 8 month up to the moment my baby was too big for it. It was also of great help for tummy times and when my baby was starting to sit. I took this pillow whenever we were travelling and it was a sure piece of comfort for my baby and me. Loved it, would recommend it to any new mom.
customer_reviews.author: Anna B

customer_reviews.title: The original product works better.
customer_reviews.text: Very useful. The cover does a good job keeping the synthetic fiber from flying out everywhere. Bought another more popular product first but had to return it since it does not have a cover so the fibers are everywhere. Also if there is spit-up, you can't wash just the cover itself. Definitely need to go with the brand and quality on this one. Don't buy the more popular product to save a couple of dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Aprial

customer_reviews.title: Best for twins too!!!
customer_reviews.text: I already owned a boppy, so when I found I was having twins I looked around and found a double boppy, but decided to,just buy another individual boppy and that was way better because I could move each one around separately. When I need to feed both at same time I just put them side by side and it works, just like a double one would. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: M. Haas

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable & worth it
customer_reviews.text: I like this pillow. It is so comfortable to hold my baby now, before my hands feel so painful & after feeding i couldn’t take my hand up. So I decided to buy a good nursing pillow then i found this pillow in amazon. Now its so easy to hold & feed my baby. Very much happy with this but only thing the pillow cover is not much soft.
customer_reviews.author: Ssa

customer_reviews.title: Love! Must-have item for baby registry!
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend all moms to add it on their baby registry! It’s so useful and I’ve bought two so far, one for my own boy and one as a gift for my best friend :)
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Must have for breastfeed moms!
customer_reviews.text: This nursing pillow is soft, sturdy and comfy. As new mom, it was very easy to breastfeed! I used it right after my son was born at the hospital. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Good baby product
customer_reviews.text: It is a decent product - not sure what the hype is about, though. I bought it thinking that it will be good for brastfeeding, but the position they describe does not suit every body type. In my case, the baby's head is too high to be able to feed. For now, I am using it as a back support for me while feeding. I am using a normal pillow to position the baby. One huge advantage is that this product is not squishy, hence provides good support (for my back). The design is very pleasant and the machine washability is a huge plus.
customer_reviews.author: MPUAM

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Good material
customer_reviews.text: Wife absolutely loves it. Whether breast feeding or bottle feeding, she always has it. She was getting very sore wrists and purchased this to help alleviate those issues and it certainly has helped. Good quality. Good material. Cover comes off easily for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Trophy Husband

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Use it to nurse at work. Fits perfectly on my lap, so I can nurse while working at my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heaven sent
customer_reviews.text: This pillow works wonders. I use it every time I nurse. It’s so helpful during the night when I’m tired and weak. Couldn’t image BF without it.
customer_reviews.author: Blackbirdsings

customer_reviews.title: Yep, this is a Boppy
customer_reviews.text: This is consistent with other Boppys. I am happy with it and would gift it or buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Strong

customer_reviews.title: The color is very deceiving
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this boppy for my son thinking the color was white. Looks pretty white in the picture and even looks white on the packaging. However, the actual color is more of a light yellow- almost the color of something that was white but has been stained by lots of cigarette smoke? I don't know how else to describe it. The pillow itself is fantastic- i love all boppy pillows. Shame the color isnt true to the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Parz

customer_reviews.title: I like how the boppy is supportive--not too hard not too ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a life saver during baby's first month! My baby was on the smaller side as a newborn, and she fit right snugly in it. The hole in the middle also allowed me to be "hands free" sometimes too. Now my baby uses it for sitting support, and I sometimes use it as a cushion for my back. I like how the boppy is supportive--not too hard not too soft. I would recommend it to new mothers for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Elim

customer_reviews.title: Essential buy!
customer_reviews.text: What is there to say about the Boppy? Other than this is a staple for any Mom's child raising arsenal! Boppy's are super versatile and easy to clean. One is enough, but why stop there? Buy at least two so while one is in the wash, you have another on hand. Or if you are like me, and use it to nurse, but one for each area you nurse in so you do not have to carry around the boppy for nursing support!
customer_reviews.author: Bri S

customer_reviews.title: Stiff and not large enough
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd Boppy that I have bought. For some reason this one is more stiff than my first one. Also, being a larger person (size XL in shirts) I found that the Boppy isn’t wide enough. It’s always slipping out of place. I wish they made different sizes to accommodate bigger people.
customer_reviews.author: Lucia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for nursing a new baby or just laying the ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for nursing a new baby or just laying the baby in it to look around. My friend has a new baby and I bought this for my house because she loves the one she owns. Now she doesn't have to bring hers over. It's definitely worth the price. Go for the name brand Boppy!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Conner

customer_reviews.title: Must have for new moms
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and can be used not only to feed baby. But for tummy time and sitting up as well
customer_reviews.author: chris82

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Gender neutral, used every feeding, now use to keep little one sitting! Very versatile. Good price!
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: ideal gift...nursing mom
customer_reviews.text: My friend loved the Boppy nursing pillow. It was just what she wanted. Happy times ahead.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie K. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Yes yes yes!
customer_reviews.text: LOVED this! This was one of the top products everyone advised me to get for a newborn, and boy were they not kidding. We used this all the time. Even when our parents came to visit, they would use this to hold our LO because it made it easier to support her while she was sleeping. I had to stop using it after a while because she got reflux and I had to feed her at an upright angle, but now we use it for a support and tummy time.
customer_reviews.author: JacquiFaye

customer_reviews.title: Love this pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't crazy about the cost of this pillow, but it is worth it! Not only is it a great nursing pillow, but my 3 month old daughter has loved it for tummy time and practicing sitting up as well. I use it so much that I bought a second one to keep around the house and for outtings!
customer_reviews.author: Laura G

customer_reviews.title: These things are great
customer_reviews.text: I wish they would've had these when I had children. Now I use it with my grand babies. It gives great arm rest and saves your neck/back. The pattern is cute. It has held up well. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the design!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Have only had to spot clean it so not sure if holds up in the washer. Very comfortable to use. Animal design is super cute, even my toddler loves to point out the animals!
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Carr

customer_reviews.title: good stuffed pillow but hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: It is a standard boppy pillow but it is hard to clean. I hope it was little bigger,
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Fun times had by all
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter loves it so much. I was skeptical of this price for a pillow, but it is huge and keeps her propped up. She's learning to sit up and especially likes this for watching NASCAR with her daddy. :)
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Parker

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: This is for skinny women/people. Only reason it gets 3 stars is because I may have use for it later down the line
customer_reviews.author: Racqs

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great for feeding. My son weighs about 14lbs, which doesn't seem like much until I am holding him and feeding him. This pillow helps my arms and back to rest.
customer_reviews.author: Glo

customer_reviews.title: it works much better as a infant positioned
customer_reviews.text: This pillow works O.K. as a nursing pillow...it works much better as a infant positioned. I have wide hips, and this pillow just pops off instead of staying in place while you are trying to nurse the baby. It was frustrating. In hind-sight, I might have bought a different nursing pillow, but this pillow will help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my daughter. Good foam that does not wear out, and nice cover material. Does the job well.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: an ABSOLUTE must!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is flipping amazing! I originally got the breast friend pillow for my baby shower, and I absolutely hate that thing! It's not very comfortable in my opinion, and seems to be made out of a cheap foam. But this pillow... This is so amazing. My husband and I use it every time we feed her! It's handy!
customer_reviews.author: Adriane

customer_reviews.title: My Brest Friend pillow was not comfortable for mothers that had a C section
customer_reviews.text: My Brest Friend pillow was not comfortable for mothers that had a C section. I'm very happy with the boppy pillow. I like the design because it doesn't show the milk spills. As LO gets older, I use blankets under the boppy pillow for leverage and better posture.
customer_reviews.author: Lora C.

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.text: I was having trouble w/ my newborn wanting to latch while breasfeeding. I think part of the problem was I was insecure in holding her. My husband purchased this for me and it has made breastfeeding so much less stressful. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is one of our favorite purchases for the baby
customer_reviews.text: This is one of our favorite purchases for the baby!!!! We use this pillow every few hours. I love nursing with it and even my husband loves bottle feeding with this pillow. My baby is 3 months old and she has grown so accustomed to eating on this pillow that just placing her on it starts to calm her down as we get her bottle ready.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Chernyak

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow for infants
customer_reviews.text: This is the only pillow that my little cousin would sleep on. He loves it so much that my aunt bought a double, in the same pattern. Very soft and very comfortable. The other reviewers mentioned that it falls flat quickly, but we haven't ran into that yet. It's available in shops like Target, if you wanted to see it before actually buying one.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Han

customer_reviews.title: Not as big as big as I was expecting for the price it is, Gets the Job done though!
customer_reviews.text: The pillow isn’t as big as I was expecting, the design is adorable however. Firm but soft if that makes sense. It gets the job done! Shipping was quick and it comes in a travel bag, easy to be on the Go. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kylee C.

customer_reviews.title: Good for feeding and tummy time
customer_reviews.text: I like this pillow, it let me feed my LO hands free. And later we used it for tummy time and as a support while my baby learnt how to seat.
customer_reviews.author: Iuliia Z.

customer_reviews.title: It’s nice but zipper goes across the entire back instead of ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice but zipper goes across the entire back instead of around the edges so can’t really use both sides unless you want a zipper Imprint on the baby
customer_reviews.author: James Harnish

customer_reviews.title: i must say i am very pleased! i haven't washed it as yet but i ...
customer_reviews.text: i must say i am very pleased ! i haven't washed it as yet but i guess once i follow the washing instructions i should be fine. but product is true to the description and i recommend it for anyone. very soft and great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Carol houllier-smith

customer_reviews.title: I love my boppy
customer_reviews.text: I have used this through every stage of my daughters life! She is 6 months old now & I use it to support her when sitting. I used it for nursing when she was a newborn & to rest her in when she was a few months old. Just don't let baby sleep unattended in it!!! I even have a second hand one to keep at my moms!
customer_reviews.author: Angela T F

customer_reviews.title: One of the best baby purchases we made!
customer_reviews.text: I love this boppy. We had a newborn one at first and love that. But our baby outgrew it at 2-3 months old. This boppy is perfect for nursing and for lying / sitting in when the baby grows older. It is also great for tummy time for those who don't love being on the floor. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: face out of it) and it worked perfect!
customer_reviews.text: must have. i use it to nurse and to "sit" my baby in it, for tummy time and even used it for naps when my baby felt insecure in her big crib i put that pillow around her (feet into the pillow, face out of it) and it worked perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Garbanzo

customer_reviews.title: Love, love the Boppy
customer_reviews.text: This is my second boppy. I just love, love this pillow. My daughter is on the petite side so she still needs some propping up and it's just awesome for those night time feedings in bed. The cover that came on this one was very cute too.
customer_reviews.author: MLP

customer_reviews.title: Mom must have!!
customer_reviews.text: Every mom should have one of these for their newborns. Makes breastfeeding easier. If you have back problems like I do then buying this is a must helps reduce the straining.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Learning tool
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this, you can put her anywhere to keep your eye on her and she is content. At first lying down but now it supports her as she learns to sit up and then she can collapse safely, when she gets tired
customer_reviews.author: fisherwoman

customer_reviews.title: This item is one of the most essential items I've ...
customer_reviews.text: This item is one of the most essential items I've purchased since the birth of my baby. I use it for feeding daily, without it I can't get as comfy
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Montayne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love his pillow. Cute pattern and multifunctional. This month we started using for tummy time.
customer_reviews.author: Ebony Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Cute baby shower gift - price is better than Bye Bye Baby (without coupon)
customer_reviews.text: What can I say - another baby shower gift. It wasn't for me, but it arrived in a nice package and the pattern is colorful and cute. I'm sure the mom-to-be I gave it to will get tons of use out of it. And, this price is better than Bye Bye Baby (unless you have a coupon for them).
customer_reviews.author: Juliak

customer_reviews.title: Boppy Pillow is Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: I have given a couple of these as gifts at baby showers. The gift is always a hit because new mothers love the Boppy Pillow. In fact, my niece who was a new mother at the time was the one who suggest I make this purchase. She certainly was right! The new mother loved this gift!
customer_reviews.author: Gusmom

customer_reviews.title: Best baby gift
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to baby gift. Everyone raves about it! Functional beyond nursing to tuck babies into for sitting on the floor or furniture!
customer_reviews.author: Dale Pruess

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy, Very Useful
customer_reviews.text: i was hesitant to buy this but i am ever so happy i did!! It does everything it says it will do!! I was always leaning forward and awkward to feed my baby, but since i use this pillow i sit upright and i noticed that i have less back aches simply a great buy it is
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these pillows
customer_reviews.text: THis was a gift, but I have one, love them MUST HAVE for any baby
customer_reviews.author: Ashlei Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived in a timely manner. The print is awesome! I actually purchased this to prop my son up while on the couch once he has bl better head control. I have the Brest Pillow for breast feeding.
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase i`ve ever made as a new mom
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase i`ve ever made as a new mom, it`s so helpful. You might find it hard to use it when baby is newborn, but after several weeks it`s ok to use and i use it till this day, my baby is 4 months old now .
customer_reviews.author: Tamar

customer_reviews.title: Great item to have while nursing.
customer_reviews.text: We use this all the time for my little guy. My wife puts this under her arm while nursing him. Perfect for when we want to sit him up and take a picture. His neck is also stronger so we'll prop him stomach-down so he can get a better view.
customer_reviews.author: Edward U.

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend buying the Boppy separate and getting some softer covers
customer_reviews.text: Cheap Fabric, not cozy for little babies! I would recommend buying the Boppy separate and getting some softer covers.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Scott

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I used it for feeding my baby ,as support when my baby roll over Nd then while he is sitting .. so ismt can be used in all stages the material is very good Nd washable
customer_reviews.author: Dilip

customer_reviews.title: Must have for baby
customer_reviews.text: Best thing ever! I love this pillow worth every penny I use it for feeding nursing tummy time baby loves it and for cleaning simply take off the cover and throw it in the washer and pillow as well can be put in the washer I just personally do not put cover in dryer I air dry instead the materIal drys quicklyo
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this purchase I don’t know why I waited to have this game changer ( new mom I guess ) I use it at all of our feedings!!
customer_reviews.author: Zenia

customer_reviews.title: My daughter hated tummy time but for some reason she is calm ...
customer_reviews.text: We use it for everything; nursing, lounging, tummy time...My daughter hated tummy time but for some reason she is calm on the poppy pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Shiko

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this pillow for myself. My baby doesn't care very much for it. Average price.
customer_reviews.author: Review

customer_reviews.title: Awesome breastfeeding pillow
customer_reviews.text: This is my second boppy for traveling! Definitely get one!
customer_reviews.author: Brian C. Borlaug

customer_reviews.title: The true boppy pillow is Worth every penny. Any ...
customer_reviews.text: The true boppy pillow is Worth every penny. Any knock off will not do. They just are not the same size and quality as the real thing. Out of all of the baby stuff, this is my most used item by far.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie

customer_reviews.title: Prefer over breastfriend
customer_reviews.text: Prefer over the breastfriend which was very uncomfortable for me. This is adequately supportive, allows use in various feeding positions, comfortable, easy to clean, versatile (baby can use too), and easy to move around the house. Pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: We ♡ Boppy
customer_reviews.text: One of the top 10 baby purchases I've made! I still use this pillow for nursing, but now it also props my baby in the sitting position. We love our boppy!
customer_reviews.author: An Avid ReaderTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Boppy rocks
customer_reviews.text: My post pregnancy size is somewhere between a 6 and 8. I love this boppy pillow for nursing my young one. this order includes a white boppy, and an adorable cover. I am happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: H and H HONEY

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Very useful. Didnt really use it for nursing but it was great for tummy time and helping her learn to sit up
customer_reviews.author: Delana Silva

customer_reviews.title: BFF
customer_reviews.text: As everybody said to me: boppy nursing pillow will be you BFF. And it is true. I am not nursing anymore but I use the boppy during tummy time or as a support behind my daughter when she was learning to sit!
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: A necessity
customer_reviews.text: As a dad I thought this was kind of dumb but after 4 months I use it for feeding and wife uses it at every feeding. Dad's buy this for your wives! Thank me later
customer_reviews.author: BonnieblueSC

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have on your registry!! ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have on your registry!! It is so versatile in what you can use it for. I use it to bottle feed, breast feed, tummy time, etc. My son and I would be lost without it. Get one that comes with a cover already and buy a few extra covers. You will wash them often!!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Elder

product_meta.title: Boppy Original Nursing Pillow & Positioner, Neutral Jungle Colors, Cotton Blend Fabric with Allover Fashion, Multi
product_meta.description: Color:Neutral Jungle ColorsThe original, award-winning Boppy Feeding and Infant Support Pillow celebrates three decades of supporting moms, dads and babies! The Boppy Original Nursing Pillow comes dressed in a cotton blend, allover fashion slipcover. It not only lifts babies to a more ergonomic position for comfortable feedings, but also transitions to support them as they grow offering the perfect spot for tummy time, playing, sitting or just discovering little fingers and toes. Have an extra nursing pillow slipcover on hand for use between wash cycles. Boppy Nursing Pillows are recommended for babies 0-12 months. Boppy Nursing Pillows are designed for your baby’s supervised, awake time.
feature_bullets: 30 YEARS OF COMFORT AND SUPPORT WHILE NURSING: The award-winning Boppy Original Pillow provides your arms and back relief by lifting your baby to a more ergonomic position when breastfeeding or bottle feeding. This fashionable pillow is a cotton blend fabric with an allover fashion.

VERSATILE USES FOR 0-12 MONTHS: The Boppy Original Nursing Pillow supports your newborn through their entire first year with propping, tummy time, sitting or just discovering little fingers and toes. Designed for your baby's supervised, awake time.

EASY CARE, MACHINE WASHABLE: The Boppy Pillow and Boppy Pillow Cover are machine washable because little messes happen. All Boppy Pillow Covers are sold separately and are guaranteed to fit the Boppy Pillow. Having an extra Boppy Pillow Cover, that easily zips on and off, is great for between wash cycles.

AWARD-WINNING QUALITY: The Boppy Pillow has won several awards voted on by parents and the baby community. The most recent wins are from the BabyCenter Mom’s Pick Best of 2018 and the 2018 What to Expect Must-Have Winner.
NURSERY MUST-HAVE: The Boppy Pillow is a registry must-have, making it the perfect gift for any baby shower. Pick an adorable, Original Nursing Pillow design that matches your nursery theme.
